title: Arcade comp tag?

embed.description: Arcade Riven and Battle Boss Blitzcrank have landed, and they're bringing retro back in style! To celebrate the launch of these skins, we're challenging you to show us the best 8bit League of Legends art you can make with Hama Beads or LEGO. Break out the ironing board, because it's Arcade time!

body:
I wanted to enter a lego creation into this comp but the instagram tag #legolol is full of photos for Lego Laugh out Loud and I was wondering if there was an alternate tag I could use. Please help or I will {{item:3070}}  {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} 
Thanks
